resources.string: "Abhitak News is a District Bijnor's popular Hindi News Channel. We cover politics, sports, Social and entertainment and others.. The vision of the channel is सबकी खबर, सब पर नज़र 24—घंटे. Abhitak News Channel maintains the repute of being a people's channel. Channel works to bring difference to the society by highlighting the issues which are of importance and affect the life of people. Abhitak News is best defined as a responsible channel with a fair and balanced approach that combines prompt reporting with insightful analysis of news and current affairs."
